# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-110">중요 한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-113">중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 위치에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-113">Sensitive information types can be used in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-114">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-114">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-115">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-115">communication compliance polcies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-116">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-116">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-117">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-117">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-118">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-118">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-119">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-120">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-121">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-121">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-123">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-124">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-126">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-128">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-129">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-134">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-135">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-155">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-156">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-157">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-157">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-159">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-160">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-161">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-161">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-162">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-163">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-163">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-164">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-165">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-166">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-168">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-168">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-169">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-170">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-171">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-171">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-175">식별 국가 Id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-175">Identification National Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-176">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-176">DNI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-177">개인의 NIC 국내 레지스트리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-177">NIC National Registry of Persons</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-178">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-178">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-182">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-184">뱅크 상태 분기 번호 유무에 관계 없이 6 ~ twn 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-184">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-186">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-186">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-187">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-188">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-189">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-190">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-191">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-195">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-199">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-200">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-216">오스트레일리아 근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-216">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-217">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-218">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-220">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-221">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-223">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-232">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-233">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-235">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_business_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-237">Keyword_australia_business_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-237">Keyword_australia_business_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-238">오스트레일리아 business 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-238">australia business no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-239">근무처 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-239">business number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-245">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-245">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-246">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-247">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-247">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-249">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-249">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-250">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-250">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-251">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-251">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-252">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-252">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-253">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-253">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-254">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-254">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-255">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-256">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-256">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-257">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-258">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-258">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-259">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-259">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-260">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-260">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-261">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-261">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-262">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-262">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-263">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-263">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-264">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-264">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-265">될</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-265">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-266">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-266">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-267">오스트레일리아 회사 번호 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-267">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-268">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-268">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-269">오스트레일리아 company 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-269">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-270">오스트레일리아 company 아니요 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-270">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-271">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-271">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-272">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-272">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-273">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-273">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-274">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-274">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-275">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-275">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-276">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-276">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-277">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-277">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-278">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-278">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-279">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-279">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-280">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-280">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-281">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-281">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-282">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-282">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-283">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-283">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-284">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-284">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-285">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-286">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-286">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-287">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-288">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-289">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-289">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-290">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-290">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-291">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-291">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-391">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-391">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-393">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-393">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-395">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-395">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-396">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-396">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-397">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-397">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-398">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-398">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-399">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-399">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-400">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-401">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-403">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-404">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-404">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-405">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-405">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-406">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-406">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-418">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-418">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-419">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-420">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-420">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-421">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-422">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-422">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-423">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-424">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-424">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-427">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-427">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-428">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-428">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-462">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-462">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-463">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-464">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-464">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-465">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-466">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-466">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-467">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-467">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-468">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-468">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-469">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-469">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-470">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-470">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-471">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-471">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-472">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-473">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-473">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-474">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-475">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-475">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-476">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-476">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-477">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-477">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-478">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-478">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-479">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-479">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-481">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-481">australian business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-483">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-483">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-484">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-484">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-487">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-487">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-488">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-488">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-489">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-489">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-490">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-490">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-491">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-491">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-492">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-492">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-493">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-493">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-494">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-494">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-495">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-495">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-496">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-497">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-497">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-498">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-499">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-499">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-500">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-500">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-501">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-501">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-502">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-502">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-507">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-507">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-508">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-508">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-511">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-511">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-512">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-512">driver's license number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-518">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-518">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-519">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-520">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-520">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-522">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-522">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-523">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-523">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-524">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-524">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-525">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-526">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-526">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-527">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-529">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-529">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-530">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-530">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-532">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-532">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-533">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-533">identity number</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-534">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-536">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-536">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-537">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-537">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-539">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-539">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-541">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-541">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-542">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-542">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-543">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-543">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-544">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-544">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-545">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-546">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-546">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-547">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-548">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-548">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-549">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-549">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-550">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-550">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-551">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-552">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-552">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-553">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-553">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-554">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-554">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-555">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-555">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-556">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-556">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-557">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-557">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-558">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-558">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-559">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-560">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-561">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-561">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-563">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-563">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-564">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-564">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-565">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-565">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-566">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-566">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-567">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-568">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-568">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-569">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-570">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-570">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-571">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-571">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-572">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-572">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-573">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-573">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-575">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-577">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-577">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-578">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-578">social security no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-581">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-581">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-582">오스트리아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-582">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-583">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-583">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-584">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-584">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-585">보험 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-585">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-586">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-586">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-587">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-587">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-588">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-588">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-589">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-589">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-591">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-591">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-593">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-593">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-594">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-595">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-595">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-596">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-596">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-597">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-597">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-598">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-598">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-599">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-599">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-600">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-600">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-601">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-602">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-604">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-604">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-605">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-605">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-606">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-606">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-607">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-607">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-608">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-608">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-609">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-609">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-610">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-610">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-611">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-611">österreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-612">st.nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-612">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-613">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-613">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-614">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-614">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-615">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-615">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-616">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-616">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-617">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-617">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-618">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-618">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-631">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-631">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-632">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-633">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-633">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-635">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-635">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-636">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-636">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-637">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-637">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-638">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-638">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-639">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-639">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-640">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-640">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-641">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-641">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-642">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-642">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-643">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-643">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-644">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-644">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-645">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-645">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-646">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-647">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-647">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-650">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-650">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-651">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-651">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-653">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-653">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-654">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-654">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-655">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-655">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-656">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-656">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-657">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-657">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-658">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-658">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-659">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-659">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-660">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-660">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-661">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-661">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-662">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-662">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-663">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-663">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-664">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-664">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-665">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-665">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-666">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-666">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-667">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-667">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-668">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-668">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-669">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-669">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-670">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-670">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-671">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-671">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-672">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-673">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-673">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-674">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-674">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-675">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-675">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-676">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-676">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-677">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-677">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-678">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-678">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-679">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-679">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-680">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-681">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-683">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-683">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-684">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-684">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-685">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-685">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-686">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-687">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-687">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-688">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-688">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-689">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-689">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-690">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-690">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-691">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-691">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-692">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-692">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-693">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-693">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-694">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-694">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-695">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-695">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-696">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-696">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-697">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-697">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-698">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-698">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-699">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-699">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-700">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-700">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-702">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-702">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-703">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-703">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-704">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-704">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-705">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-705">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-706">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-707">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-707">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-708">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-708">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-709">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-709">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-710">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-710">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-711">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-711">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-712">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-712">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-713">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-713">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-714">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-714">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-715">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-715">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-716">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-716">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-717">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-717">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-718">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-718">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-719">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-719">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-720">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-720">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-721">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-721">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-722">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-722">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-723">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-724">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-724">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-725">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-726">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-727">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-727">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-728">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-728">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-729">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-729">Keywords</span></span>
