## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-743">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-743">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-745">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-745">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-746">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-746">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-747">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-747">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-748">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-748">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-749">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-749">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-750">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-750">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-751">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-751">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-752">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-752">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-753">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-753">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-754">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-754">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-755">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-755">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-756">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-756">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-757">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-757">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-758">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-758">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-759">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-759">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-760">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-760">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-761">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-761">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-762">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-763">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-766">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-766">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-767">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-767">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-774">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-774">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-775">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-775">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-776">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-776">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-782">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-782">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-783">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-784">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-784">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-785">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-786">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-786">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-787">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-787">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-788">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-788">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-790">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-793">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-793">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-794">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-794">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-809">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-809">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-810">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-811">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-811">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-812">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-812">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-813">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-813">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-814">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-814">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-815">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-815">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-816">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-816">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-817">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-817">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-818">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-818">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-819">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-819">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-820">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-820">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-821">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-821">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-822">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-822">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-823">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-824">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-825">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-826">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-826">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-827">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-827">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-828">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-828">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-829">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-830">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-830">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-835">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-835">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-836">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-836">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-837">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-837">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-838">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-838">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-843">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-843">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-845">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-845">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-846">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-847">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-847">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-848">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-848">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-849">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-849">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-850">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-850">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-851">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-851">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-852">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-852">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-853">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-853">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-854">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-855">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-855">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-858">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-858">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-859">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-859">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-860">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-861">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-861">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-862">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-862">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-863">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-863">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-864">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-864">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-865">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-866">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-866">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-867">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-868">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-868">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-869">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-869">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-870">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-870">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-871">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-871">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-872">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-872">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-873">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-873">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-874">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-874">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-875">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-876">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-876">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-877">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-877">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-878">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-879">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-879">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-880">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-881">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-881">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-882">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-882">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-883">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-883">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-884">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-884">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-890">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-890">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-891">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-891">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-892">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-892">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-896">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-896">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-897">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-897">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-898">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-898">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-899">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-900">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-900">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-901">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-901">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-902">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-902">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-903">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-904">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-904">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-905">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-905">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-906">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-906">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-907">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-907">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-908">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-908">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-909">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-909">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-910">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-910">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-911">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-911">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-912">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-912">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-913">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-914">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-916">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-916">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-917">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-917">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-918">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-918">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-919">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-919">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-937">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-937">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-938">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-939">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-939">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-941">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-941">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-942">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-943">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-948">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-949">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-949">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-950">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-950">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-951">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-952">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-952">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-953">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-953">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-954">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-954">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-955">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-956">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-956">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-957">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-958">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-958">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-959">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-959">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-960">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-960">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-962">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-962">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-980">fuehrerschein-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-980">fuehrerschein- Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-981">fuehrerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-981">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-982">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-982">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-983">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-984">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-984">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-986">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-986">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-987">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-987">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-988">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-988">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-989">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-989">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-990">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-990">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-991">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-991">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-992">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-993">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-993">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-994">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-995">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-995">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-996">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-996">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-997">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-997">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-998">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-998">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-999">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-999">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1000">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1000">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1001">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1001">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1060">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1060">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1061">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1061">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1062">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1063">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1063">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1064">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1065">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1065">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1066">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1067">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1067">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1068">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1070">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1070">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1071">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1071">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1072">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1072">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1076">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1076">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1081">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1081">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1082">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1082">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1083">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1084">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1084">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1085">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1086">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1086">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1087">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1087">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1088">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1088">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1089">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1089">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1090">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1090">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1091">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1091">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1092">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1092">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1094">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1094">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1112">identifiantnational #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1112">identifiantnational#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1113">numéronational #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1113">numéronational#</span></span>


## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1114">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1114">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1115">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1116">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1116">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1118">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1118">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1119">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1119">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1120">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1120">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1121">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1121">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1122">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1122">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1123">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1123">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1124">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1124">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1125">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1125">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1126">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1126">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1128">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1128">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1131">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1131">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1132">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1132">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1134">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1134">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1135">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1135">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1136">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1136">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1137">n º va</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1137">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1138">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1138">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1139">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1139">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1140">numéro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1140">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1141">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1141">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1142">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1142">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1143">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1143">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1144">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1144">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1145">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1145">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1146">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1146">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1148">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1148">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1150">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1150">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1151">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1152">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1152">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1153">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1154">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1154">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1155">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1155">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1156">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1156">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1157">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1157">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1158">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1158">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1159">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1159">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1160">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1161">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1162">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1163">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1163">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1164">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1164">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1165">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1165">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1166">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1166">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1167">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1167">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1168">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1168">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1170">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1170">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1171">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1171">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1172">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1172">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1173">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1173">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1174">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1174">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1175">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1175">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1176">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1176">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1177">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1177">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1178">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1178">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1179">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1179">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1180">고 eita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1180">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1181">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1181">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1182">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1182">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1183">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1183">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1184">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1184">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1185">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1185">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1186">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1186">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1187">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1187">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1188">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1189">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1189">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1190">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1190">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1191">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1191">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1192">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1192">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1193">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1193">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1194">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1194">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1195">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1196">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1199">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1199">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1200">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1200">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1201">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1203">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1203">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1204">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1205">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1205">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1206">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1206">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1226">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1226">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1227">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1228">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1228">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1229">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1229">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1230">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1231">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1231">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1232">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1232">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1233">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1233">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1234">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1234">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1235">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1235">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1236">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1236">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1237">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1237">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1238">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1238">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1239">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1239">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1240">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1240">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1241">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1241">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1242">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1242">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1244">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1244">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1247">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1247">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1248">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1248">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1249">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1249">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1250">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1251">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1251">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1253">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1253">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1254">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1254">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1255">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1255">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1256">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1256">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1257">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1257">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1258">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1258">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1259">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1259">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1260">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1260">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1261">RG(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1261">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1262">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1262">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1263">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1263">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1266">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1266">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1268">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1268">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1269">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1269">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1270">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1270">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1271">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1271">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1272">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1272">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1273">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1273">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1274">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1274">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1280">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1280">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1285">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1285">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1286">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1286">driver's licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1290">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1290">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1293">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1293">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1294">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1295">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1295">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1296">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1297">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1297">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1298">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1298">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1299">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1299">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1300">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1300">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1301">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1301">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1302">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1303">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1303">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1304">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1305">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1305">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1306">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1306">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1307">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1307">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1308">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1309">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1309">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
