## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1354">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1354">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1355">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1355">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1356">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1357">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1357">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1358">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1359">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1359">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1360">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1361">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1361">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1362">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1363">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1363">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1364">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1364">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1365">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1365">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1366">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1366">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1367">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1367">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1368">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1368">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1369">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1369">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1370">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1370">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1371">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1371">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1372">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1372">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1373">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1374">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1374">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1375">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1376">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1376">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1377">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1377">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1378">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1378">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1379">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1379">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1380">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1380">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1381">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1381">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1382">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1382">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1383">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1384">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1384">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1385">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1386">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1386">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1387">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1387">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1388">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1388">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1389">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1389">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1390">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1391">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1391">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1392">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1392">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1416">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1416">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1417">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1418">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1418">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1420">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1420">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1421">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1422">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1422">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1423">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1425">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1425">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1426">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1426">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1427">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1427">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1563">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1563">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1564">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1565">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1565">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1567">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1567">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1568">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1569">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1569">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1572">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1572">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1573">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1573">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1574">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1574">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1575">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1575">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1576">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1576">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1577">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1577">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1578">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1578">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1579">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1579">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1580">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1580">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1581">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1581">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1582">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1582">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1583">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1583">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1584">종류</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1584">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1585">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1585">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1586">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1587">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1587">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1588">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1589">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1589">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1590">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1591">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1592">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1593">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1593">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1594">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1594">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1595">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1595">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1625">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1625">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1627">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1627">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1629">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1629">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1630">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1631">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1631">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1632">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1633">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1634">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1634">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1635">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1635">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1668">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1668">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1669">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1670">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1670">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1671">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1671">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1672">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1672">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1673">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1673">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1674">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1674">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1675">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1675">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1676">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1676">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1677">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1677">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1678">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1678">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1679">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1679">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1680">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1680">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1681">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1681">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1682">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1682">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1683">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1683">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1684">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1684">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1685">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1685">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1686">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1686">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1687">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1687">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1688">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1689">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1690">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1690">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1691">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1691">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1692">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1692">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1717">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1717">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1718">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1719">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1719">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1721">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1721">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1722">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1722">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1723">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1723">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1724">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1724">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1725">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1725">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1726">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1726">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1727">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1727">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1728">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1728">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1729">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1730">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1732">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1733">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1733">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1734">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1734">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1735">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1735">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1736">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1736">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1737">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1737">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1738">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1738">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1739">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1739">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1740">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1740">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1741">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1741">National Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1742">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1742">Identity card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1743">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1743">ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1744">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1744">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1745">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1745">Rol Único Nacional</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1753">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1753">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1754">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1755">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1755">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1757">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1757">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1758">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1758">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1759">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1759">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1760">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1760">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1761">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1761">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1762">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1763">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1766">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1766">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1767">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1767">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1768">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1768">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1769">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1770">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1770">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1771">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1772">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1772">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1773">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1773">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1774">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1774">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1775">중국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1775">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1776">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1776">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1777">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1777">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1778">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1778">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1779">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1779">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1780">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1780">鉴定</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1784">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1784">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1785">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1786">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1786">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1788">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1788">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1790">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1790">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1793">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1793">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1794">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1794">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1795">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1795">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1796">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1796">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1797">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1797">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1798">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1798">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1799">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1799">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1800">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1800">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-1801">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-1801">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2061">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2061">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2062">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2062">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2063">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2064">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2064">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2065">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2066">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2066">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2067">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2067">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2068">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2068">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2069">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2069">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2070">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2070">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2071">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2071">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2072">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2072">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2073">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2073">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2077">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2077">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2078">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2078">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2088">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2088">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2089">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2089">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2090">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2091">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2091">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2093">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2093">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2094">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2095">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2095">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2096">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2098">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2098">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2099">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2099">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2100">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2100">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2101">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2101">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2102">majstorski broj građana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2102">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2103">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2103">master citizen number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2130">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2130">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2131">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2133">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2133">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2135">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2135">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2137">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2140">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2140">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2141">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2141">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2142">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2142">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2143">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2143">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2144">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2144">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2145">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2145">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2146">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2146">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2147">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2147">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2148">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2148">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2149">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2150">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2150">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2151">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2152">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2152">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2153">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2153">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2154">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2154">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2155">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2156">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2156">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2157">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2158">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2159">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2159">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2160">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2160">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2161">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2161">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2163">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2163">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2164">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2195">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2195">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2196">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2196">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2197">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2198">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2198">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2199">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2199">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2200">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2200">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2201">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2201">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2202">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2202">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2203">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2204">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2207">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2207">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2208">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2210">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2210">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2227">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2227">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2228">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2228">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2229">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2230">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2230">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2231">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2232">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2232">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2233">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2234">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2234">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2236">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2237">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2237">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2238">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2238">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2239">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2239">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2240">Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2240">Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2243">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2243">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2244">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2244">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2245">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2245">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2247">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2247">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2248">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2248">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2249">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2249">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2250">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2250">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2253">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2253">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2254">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2254">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2255">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2255">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2256">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2256">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2257">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2257">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2258">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2259">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2259">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2260">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2261">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2261">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2262">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2262">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2263">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2263">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2264">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2264">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2265">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2265">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2266">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2266">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2267">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2267">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2268">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2268">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2269">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2269">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2270">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2270">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2271">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2271">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2272">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2272">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2273">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2274">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2275">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2275">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2277">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2277">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2278">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2279">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2279">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2282">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2282">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2283">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2283">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2284">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2284">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2285">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2285">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2286">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2286">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2287">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2287">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2288">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2288">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2289">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2289">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2290">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2290">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2291">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2291">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2292">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2292">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2293">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2293">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2294">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2294">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2295">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2295">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2296">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2296">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2297">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2297">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2298">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2298">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2299">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2299">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2300">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2300">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2301">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2302">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2302">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2303">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2303">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2304">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2304">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2305">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2305">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2333">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2333">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2334">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2334">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2335">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2336">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2336">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2337">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2338">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2338">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2339">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2339">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2340">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2340">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2341">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2341">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2343">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2343">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2346">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2347">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2353">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2353">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2357">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2357">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2358">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2358">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2359">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2359">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2360">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2360">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2361">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2361">driving license number</span></span>
