- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2363">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2363">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>


## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2364">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2364">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2365">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2365">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2366">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2367">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2367">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2368">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2369">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2369">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2370">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2371">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2373">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2373">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2374">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2374">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2375">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2375">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2376">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2377">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2377">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2378">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2378">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2379">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2379">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2380">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2380">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2381">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2381">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2382">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2382">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2383">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2383">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2385">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2385">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2387">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2387">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2388">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2388">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2389">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2389">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2390">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2390">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2391">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2391">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2392">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2392">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2393">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2393">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2394">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2394">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2395">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2396">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2396">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2397">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2398">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2399">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2399">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2401">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2402">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2402">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2403">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2403">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2404">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2404">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2451">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2451">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2452">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2453">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2454">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2454">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2455">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2456">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2456">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2457">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2457">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2458">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2458">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2459">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2459">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2460">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2460">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2461">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2462">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2462">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2465">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2465">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2466">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2466">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2467">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2467">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2468">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2468">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2474">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2474">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2484">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2484">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2485">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2487">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2487">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2489">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2489">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2490">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2491">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2491">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2492">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2493">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2493">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2494">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2494">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2495">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2495">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2512">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2512">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2513">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2514">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2515">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2515">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2517">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2517">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2518">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2519">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2519">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2520">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2521">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2522">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2522">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2523">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2523">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2524">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2524">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2525">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2525">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2526">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2526">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2527">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2527">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2528">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2528">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2529">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2529">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2530">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2530">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2531">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2531">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2532">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2532">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2533">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2534">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2534">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2535">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2536">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2536">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2537">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2537">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2538">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2538">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2539">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2539">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2540">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2541">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2544">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2544">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2545">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2545">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2546">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2547">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2547">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2548">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2548">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2549">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2549">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2621">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2621">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2622">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2622">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2623">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2624">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2624">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2625">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2626">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2626">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2627">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2627">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2628">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2628">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2629">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2629">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2630">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2631">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2631">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2632">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2633">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2633">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2634">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2634">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2635">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2635">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2636">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2636">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2637">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2637">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2638">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2638">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2639">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2639">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2640">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2640">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2643">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2643">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2644">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2644">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2645">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2645">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2646">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2646">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2647">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2647">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2648">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2648">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2649">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2649">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2650">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2650">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2651">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2651">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2652">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2653">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2653">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2654">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2655">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2655">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2656">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2656">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2657">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2657">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2658">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2658">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2659">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2660">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2660">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2662">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2662">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2663">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2663">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2664">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2664">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2665">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2665">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2666">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2666">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2667">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2667">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2668">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2668">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2669">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2669">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2670">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2670">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2671">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2671">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2672">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2672">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2673">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2673">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2674">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2674">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2675">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2676">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2676">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2677">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2679">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2679">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2680">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2680">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2681">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2681">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2683">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2683">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2686">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2686">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2687">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2687">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2688">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2688">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2689">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2689">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2690">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2690">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2691">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2691">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2692">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2692">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2693">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2693">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2694">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2694">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2695">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2695">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2696">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2696">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2697">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2698">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2698">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2700">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2700">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2701">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2701">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2702">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2702">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2703">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2703">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2704">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2704">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2706">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2706">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2709">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2709">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2710">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2710">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2712">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2712">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2745">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2745">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2746">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2746">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2747">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2748">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2748">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2749">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2750">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2750">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2751">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2751">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2752">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2752">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2753">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2753">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2754">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2754">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2755">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2755">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2756">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2756">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2757">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2757">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2758">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2758">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2759">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2759">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2760">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2760">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2761">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2761">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2762">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2762">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2763">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2764">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2765">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2767">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2767">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2768">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2771">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2772">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2773">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2774">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2775">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2776">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2777">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2778">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2779">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2791">american express</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2791">american express</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2792">americanexpress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2792">americanexpress</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2793">americano espresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2793">americano espresso</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2794">amex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2794">amex</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-2795">atm card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-2795">atm card</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3225">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3225">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3226">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3226">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3227">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3228">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3228">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3230">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3230">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3231">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3232">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3233">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3233">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3234">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3235">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3235">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3237">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3237">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3238">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3238">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3239">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3239">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3240">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3240">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3241">Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3241">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3242">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3242">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3243">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3243">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3244">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3244">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3245">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3245">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3246">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3246">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3247">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3247">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3248">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3248">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3249">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3249">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3250">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3250">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3251">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3251">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3252">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3252">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3253">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3253">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3254">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3254">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3255">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3255">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3257">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3257">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3259">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3259">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3260">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3260">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3261">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3261">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3262">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3262">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3263">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3264">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3264">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3265">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3267">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3267">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3268">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3268">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3269">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3269">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3274">finsjukförsäkringskort a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3274">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3275">건강 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3275">health card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3276">건강 보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3276">health insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3277">건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3277">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3278">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3278">hälsokort</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3286">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3286">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3287">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3288">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3288">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3290">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3290">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3291">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3291">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3292">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3292">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3293">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3293">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3294">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3294">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3295">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3296">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3298">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3298">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3299">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3299">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3300">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3300">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3301">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3301">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3303">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3303">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3304">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3304">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3353">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3353">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3354">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3355">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3356">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3356">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3357">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3358">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3358">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3359">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3359">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3360">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3360">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3365">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3365">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3366">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3366">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3367">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3368">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3368">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3369">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3369">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3370">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3370">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3371">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3371">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3372">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3372">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3373">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3374">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3374">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3375">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3376">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3376">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3377">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3377">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3378">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3378">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3379">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3379">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3380">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3380">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3381">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3381">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3382">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3382">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3383">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3383">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3384">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3385">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3385">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3387">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3388">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3388">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3389">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3389">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3391">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3391">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3415">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3415">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3416">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3416">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3417">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3418">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3418">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3420">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3420">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3421">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3422">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3422">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3423">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3425">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3425">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3426">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3426">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3427">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3427">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3428">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3428">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3434">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3434">driving license</span></span>
