## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3440">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3440">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3441">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3442">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3442">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3443">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3444">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3444">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3445">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3445">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3446">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3446">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3447">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3447">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3448">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3448">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3449">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3449">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3454">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3454">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3455">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3455">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3456">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3456">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3457">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3457">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3458">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3458">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3459">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3459">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3460">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3460">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3461">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3461">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3462">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3462">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3463">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3463">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3464">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3464">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3465">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3465">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3466">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3466">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3467">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3467">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3468">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3468">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3469">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3469">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3470">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3470">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3471">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3471">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3472">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3472">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3473">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3473">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3474">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3474">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3475">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3475">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3476">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3476">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3477">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3477">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3478">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3478">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3479">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3479">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3480">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3480">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3481">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3481">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3482">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3482">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3483">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3483">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3484">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3484">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3485">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3485">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3486">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3486">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3487">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3488">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3488">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3490">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3490">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3491">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3491">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3492">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3492">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3493">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3493">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3495">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3495">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3497">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3498">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3498">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3499">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3499">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3500">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3500">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3501">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3501">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3502">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3502">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3503">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3503">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3504">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3504">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3505">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3505">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3506">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3506">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3507">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3507">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3508">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3508">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3509">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3509">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3510">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3510">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3511">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3511">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3512">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3512">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3513">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3513">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3514">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3514">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3515">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3515">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3516">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3516">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3517">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3517">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3518">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3518">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3519">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3519">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3520">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3520">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3521">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3521">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3522">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3523">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3523">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3524">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3524">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3525">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3525">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3526">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3526">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3527">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3527">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3528">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3528">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3530">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3532">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3533">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3533">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3534">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3534">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3535">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3536">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3536">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3537">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3537">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3538">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3538">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3539">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3539">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3540">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3540">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3541">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3541">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3542">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3542">insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3545">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3545">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3546">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3546">national identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3549">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3549">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3550">d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3550">d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3551">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3551">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3552">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3552">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3553">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3553">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3554">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3554">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3555">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3555">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3556">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3556">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3557">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3557">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3558">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3558">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3559">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3559">d'identité nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3560">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3560">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3561">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3561">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3564">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3564">code sécu</span></span> 

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3565">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3565">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3566">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3567">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3567">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3568">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3569">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3569">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3570">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3570">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3571">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3571">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3572">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3572">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3573">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3573">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3574">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3574">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3575">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3575">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3576">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3576">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3577">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3577">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3578">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3578">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3579">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3579">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3580">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3581">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3581">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3582">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3583">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3584">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3584">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3585">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3585">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3587">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3587">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3593">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3593">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3594">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3594">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3599">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3599">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3600">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3600">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3601">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3601">taxno#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3607">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3607">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3608">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3609">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3609">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3610">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3611">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3611">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3612">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3612">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3613">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3613">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3614">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3614">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3615">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3615">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3616">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3616">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3617">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3617">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3618">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3618">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3619">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3619">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3620">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3620">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3622">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3622">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3624">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3625">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3625">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3626">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3626">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3628">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3628">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3630">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3630">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3631">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3631">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3632">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3632">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3633">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3633">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3634">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3634">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3635">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3635">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3636">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3636">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3637">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3637">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3638">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3638">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3639">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3639">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3640">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3640">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3641">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3641">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3642">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3642">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3643">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3644">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3644">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3646">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3646">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3647">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3647">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3648">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3648">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3649">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3649">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3650">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3650">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3651">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3651">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3652">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3653">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3653">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3655">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3655">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3656">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3656">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3657">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3657">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3658">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3658">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3659">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3659">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3660">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3660">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3661">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3661">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3662">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3662">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3663">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3663">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3664">Führerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3664">Führerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3665">Fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3665">Fuhrerschein</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3667">Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3667">Führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3668">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3668">Fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3669">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3669">Fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3670">Führerschein-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3670">Führerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3671">Fuhrerschein-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3671">Fuhrerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3672">Fuehrerschein-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3672">Fuehrerschein-</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3673">FührerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3673">FührerscheinnummerNr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3674">FuhrerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3674">FuhrerscheinnummerNr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3675">FuehrerscheinnummerNr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3675">FuehrerscheinnummerNr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3676">FührerscheinnummerKlasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3676">FührerscheinnummerKlasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3677">FuhrerscheinnummerKlasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3677">FuhrerscheinnummerKlasse</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3754">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3754">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3755">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3756">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3756">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3757">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3757">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3759">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3759">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3760">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3760">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3761">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3761">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3762">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3762">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3763">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3763">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3764">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3765">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3765">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3766">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3767">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3767">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3768">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3768">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3769">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3769">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3785">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3785">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3786">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3786">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3787">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3788">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3788">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3789">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3790">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3790">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3791">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3791">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3792">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3792">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3793">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3793">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3794">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3794">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3795">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3795">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3796">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3796">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3797">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3797">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3798">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3799">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3799">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3800">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3800">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3801">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3801">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3802">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3802">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3803">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3803">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3804">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3804">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3805">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3822">bnationalit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3822">bnationalit.t</span></span>


## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3823">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3823">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3824">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3824">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3825">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3825">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3826">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3826">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3827">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3827">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3828">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3828">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3829">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3829">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3830">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3830">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3831">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3831">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3832">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3832">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3833">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3833">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3834">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3834">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3835">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3835">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3836">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3837">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3837">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3839">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3839">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3840">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3840">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3841">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3841">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3842">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3843">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3843">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3853">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3853">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3856">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3856">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3857">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3857">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3858">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3858">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3869">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3869">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3870">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3871">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3871">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3872">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3873">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3873">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3874">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3874">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3875">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3875">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3876">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3876">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3877">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3877">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3878">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3878">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3879">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3879">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3880">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3880">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3881">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3881">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3883">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3883">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3886">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3886">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3887">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3887">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3889">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3889">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3890">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3890">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3891">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3891">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3892">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3892">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3893">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3893">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3894">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3894">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3895">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3895">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3896">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3896">mwst</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3899">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3899">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3900">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3900">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3901">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3902">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3902">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3903">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3904">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3904">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3905">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3906">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3906">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3907">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3908">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3908">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3909">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3909">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3910">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3910">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3911">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3911">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3915">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3915">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3916">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3916">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3919">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3919">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3920">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3920">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3921">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3921">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3922">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3922">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3923">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3923">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3927">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3927">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3928">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3929">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3929">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3930">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3931">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3931">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3932">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3932">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3933">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3933">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3934">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3934">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3935">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3935">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3936">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3936">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3937">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3937">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3938">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3938">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3939">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3940">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3940">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3942">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3943">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3943">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3944">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3944">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3945">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3945">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3946">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3946">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3947">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3947">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3948">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3948">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3949">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3949">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3950">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3950">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3951">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3951">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3952">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3952">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3953">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3953">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3954">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3954">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3955">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3955">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3956">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3956">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3957">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3957">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3958">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3958">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3959">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3959">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3960">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3960">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3961">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3961">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3962">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3962">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3963">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3963">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3964">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3964">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3965">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3965">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3966">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3966">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3967">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3967">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3968">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3968">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3969">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3970">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3970">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3971">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3971">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3972">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3972">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3973">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3973">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3974">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3974">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3975">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3975">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3976">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3977">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3977">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3978">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3978">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3979">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3979">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3980">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3981">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3981">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3983">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3984">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3984">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-3985">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-3985">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4014">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4014">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4015">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4016">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4016">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4018">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4018">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4019">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4019">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4020">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4020">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4021">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4021">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4022">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4023">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4023">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4024">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4025">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4025">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4026">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4026">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4027">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4027">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4028">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4028">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4029">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4030">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4030">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4031">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4071">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4071">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4072">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4072">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4073">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4074">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4074">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4075">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4076">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4076">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4077">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4077">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4078">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4078">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4079">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4080">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4081">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4082">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4082">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4083">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4083">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4084">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4084">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
