## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4100">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4100">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4101">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4102">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4102">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4104">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4104">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4105">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4105">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4106">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4106">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4107">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4107">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4108">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4108">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4109">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4110">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4110">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4111">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4112">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4112">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4113">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4113">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4114">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4114">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4115">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4115">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4116">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4116">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4120">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4120">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4121">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4121">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4122">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4122">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4123">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4123"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4124">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4124">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4126">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4126">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4127">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4127">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4128">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4129">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4130">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4130">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4131">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4132">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4132">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4133">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4134">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4134">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4137">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4137">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4138">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4138">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4139">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4139">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4140">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4140">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4141">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4141">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4142">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4142">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4143">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4143">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4144">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4144">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4145">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4145">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4146">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4148">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4148">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4150">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4150">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4155">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4155">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4156">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4156">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4157">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4158">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4158">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4159">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4159">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4160">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4160">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4169">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4169">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4171">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4171">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4172">áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4172">áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4173">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4173">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4174">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4174">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4175">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4175">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4176">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4176">áfa szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4178">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4178">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4179">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4180">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4180">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4182">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4182">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4183">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4183">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4184">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4184">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4185">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4185">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4186">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4186">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4187">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4187">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4188">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4188">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4189">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4190">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4190">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4191">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4191">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4193">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4193">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4194">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4194">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4195">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4195">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4196">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4196">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4197">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4197">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4198">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4198">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4199">헝가리어 언급</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4199">hungarian tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4200">hungatiantin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4200">hungatiantin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4201">세금 기관 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4201">tax authority no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4202">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4202">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4203">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4203">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4204">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4204">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4205">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4205">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4206">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4206">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4207">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4207">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4208">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4208">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4209">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4209">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4210">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4210">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4211">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4211">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4212">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4212">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4213">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4213">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4214">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4214">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4215">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4215">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4216">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4216">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4217">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4217">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4219">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4219">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4220">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4221">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4221">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4222">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4223">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4223">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4224">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4224">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4225">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4225">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4226">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4226">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4227">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4227">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4228">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4228">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4229">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4229">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4230">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4230">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4231">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4231">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4232">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4232">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4233">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4233">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4234">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4234">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4235">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4235">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4236">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4236">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4237">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4237">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4238">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4238">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4239">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4239">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4240">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4240">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4241">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4241">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4242">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4242">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4243">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4243">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4244">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4244">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4245">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4245">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4246">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4246">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4247">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4247">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4248">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4248">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4249">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4250">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4250">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4251">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4252">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4252">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4253">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4253">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4254">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4254">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4255">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4255">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4256">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4256">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4257">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4257">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4258">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4258">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4259">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4259">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4260">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4260">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4261">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4261">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4262">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4262">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4263">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4263">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4264">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4264">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4265">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4265">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4266">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4266">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4267">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4267">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4269">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4269">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4271">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4271">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4272">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4272">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4273">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4273">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4274">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4274">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4275">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4275">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4276">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4276">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4277">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4278">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4279">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4281">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4281">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4282">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4282">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4283">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4283">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4285">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4285">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4286">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4287">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4287">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4288">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4288">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4289">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4289">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4290">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4290">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4291">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4291">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4292">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4292">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4293">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4293">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4294">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4295">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4295">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4296">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4297">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4297">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4298">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4298">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4299">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4299">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4300">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4300">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4301">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4301">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4302">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4302">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4303">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4303">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4304">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4304">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4305">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4305">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4306">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4307">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4307">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4308">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4309">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4310">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4310">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4311">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4311">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4312">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4312">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4313">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4313">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4314">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4314">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4315">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4315">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4316">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4316">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4317">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4317">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4318">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4319">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4319">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4321">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4321">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4322">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4322">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4323">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4323">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4324">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4324">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4325">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4325">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4326">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4326">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4327">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4327">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4328">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4328">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4329">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4330">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4330">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4331">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4332">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4332">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4333">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4333">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4334">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4335">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4335">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4336">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4336">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4337">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4337">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4338">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4339">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4339">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4341">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4341">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4343">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4345">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4346">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4346">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4347">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4347">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4348">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4348">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4349">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4349">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4350">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4350">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4351">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4351">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4352">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4352">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4353">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4353">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4354">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4354">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4355">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4355">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4356">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4356">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4357">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4357">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4358">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4358">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4359">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4359">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4360">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4361">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4361">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4362">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4363">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4363">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4364">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4364">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4365">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4365">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4367">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4367">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4368">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4368">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4369">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4369">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4370">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4370">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4371">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4371">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4372">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4372">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4373">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4373">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4374">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4374">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4375">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4375">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4376">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4376">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4377">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4377">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4378">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4378">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4379">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4380">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4381">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4383">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4383">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4384">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4384">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4385">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4385">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4386">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4386">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4387">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4387">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4388">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4388">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4389">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4389">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4390">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4390">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4391">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4391">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4392">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4392">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4393">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4393">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4394">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4394">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4395">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4395">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4396">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4396">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4397">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4397">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4398">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4398">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4399">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4399">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4400">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4400">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4402">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4402">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4403">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4404">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4404">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4405">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4405">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4406">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4406">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4407">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4408">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4408">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4410">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4411">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4411">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4412">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4412">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4413">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4413">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4414">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4414">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4417">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4417">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4418">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4418">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4419">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4419">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4420">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4420">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4421">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4421">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4422">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4422">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4423">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4423">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4424">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4424">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4425">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4425">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4426">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4426">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4427">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4427">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>


## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4428">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4428">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4429">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4429">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4430">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4431">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4431">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4432">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4432">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4433">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4433">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4434">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4434">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4435">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4435">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4436">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4437">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4438">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4440">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4440">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4441">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4441">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4442">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4442">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4443">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4443">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4444">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4444">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4445">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4445">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4446">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4446">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4447">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4447">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4448">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4448">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4449">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4449">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4450">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4450">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4451">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4451">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4452">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4453">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4453">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4454">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4454">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4455">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4455">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4456">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4456">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4458">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4458">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4459">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4460">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4460">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4461">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4461">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4462">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4462">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4463">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4463">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4464">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4464">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4465">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4466">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4468">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4468">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4469">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4469">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4470">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4470">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4471">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4472">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4473">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4473">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4474">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
