## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4519">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4519">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4520">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4521">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4521">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4522">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4523">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4523">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4524">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4524">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4525">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4525">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4526">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4527">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4527">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4528">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4528">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4529">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4529">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4530">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4530">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4531">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4532">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4532">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4535">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4535">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4536">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4536">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4537">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4537">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4538">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4538">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4539">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4539">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4540">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4540">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4541">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4541">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4542">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4542">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4543">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4543">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4544">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4544">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4545">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4545">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4546">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4546">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4547">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4547">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4548">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4549">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4549">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4550">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4551">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4552">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4552">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4553">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4553">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4554">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4555">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4556">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4556">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4557">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4557">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4558">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4558">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4559">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4559">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4560">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4562">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4562">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4563">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4564">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4564">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4565">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4565">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4566">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4566">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4567">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4567">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4568">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4568">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4569">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4570">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4573">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4573">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4574">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4574">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4575">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4576">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4576">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4577">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4577">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4578">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4578">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4579">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4579">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4580">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4581">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4581">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4583">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4583">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4584">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4584">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4585">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4585">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4586">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4586">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4587">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4587">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4588">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4588">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4589">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4589">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4590">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4590">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4591">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4591">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4592">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4592">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4593">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4593">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4594">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4594">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4595">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4595">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4596">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4596">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4597">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4597">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4598">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4598">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4606">numero certificato personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4606">numero certificato personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4607">numero di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4607">numero di identificazione fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4608">numero id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4608">numero id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4609">numero personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4609">numero personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4610">개인 인증서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4610">personal certificate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4611">개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4611">personal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4612">개인 id 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4612">personal id code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4613">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4613">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4614">personalcodeno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4614">personalcodeno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4615">세금 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4615">tax code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4616">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4616">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4617">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4617">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4618">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4618">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4620">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4620">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4621">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4621">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4622">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4622">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4623">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4623">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4624">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4624">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4625">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4625">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4633">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4633">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4634">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4634">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4635">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4636">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4636">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4637">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4638">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4638">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4639">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4639">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4640">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4640">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4641">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4642">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4642">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4643">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4644">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4644">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4645">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4645">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4646">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4646">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4647">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4647">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4648">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4648">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4649">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4649">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4650">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4650">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4651">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4651">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4652">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4652">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4653">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4653">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4654">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4654">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4655">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4655">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4656">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4656">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4657">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4657">numéro passeport</span></span>


## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4658">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4658">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4659">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4660">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4660">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4662">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4662">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4663">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4663">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4664">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4664">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4665">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4665">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4666">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4666">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4668">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4671">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4671">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4672">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4672">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4674">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4674">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4675">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4675">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4676">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4676">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4679">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4679">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4682">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4682">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4684">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4684">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4686">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4686">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4687">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4687">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4688">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4688">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4689">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4689">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4690">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4690">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4691">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4691">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4693">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4693">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4696">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4696">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4697">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4697">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4698">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4698">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4699">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4699">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4700">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4700">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4701">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4702">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4702">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4703">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4703">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4704">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4704">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4705">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4705">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4706">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4706">Checking Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4707">Checking Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4707">Checking Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4708">Checking Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4708">Checking Account #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4709">Checking Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4709">Checking Acct Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4710">Checking Acct #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4710">Checking Acct #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4711">Checking Acct No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4711">Checking Acct No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4712">Checking Account No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4712">Checking Account No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4713">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4713">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4714">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4714">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4715">Bank Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4715">Bank Account #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4716">Bank Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4716">Bank Acct Number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4762">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4762">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4764">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4764">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4766">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4766">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4771">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4771">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4772">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4772">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4800">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4800">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4802">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4802">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4804">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4804">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4805">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4805">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4806">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4806">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4808">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4808">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4811">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4811">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4812">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4812">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4814">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4814">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4827">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4827">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4829">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4829">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4831">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4831">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4832">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4832">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4833">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4833">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4834">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4834">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4835">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4835">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4836">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4836">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4837">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4838">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4840">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4840">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4841">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4841">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4842">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4842">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4843">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4843">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4844">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4844">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4845">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4845">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4846">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4846">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4847">내 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4847">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4848">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4848">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4849">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4849">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4850">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4850">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4851">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4851">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4852">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4852">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4853">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4853">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4854">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4854">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4855">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4855">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4856">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4856">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4857">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4857">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4858">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4859">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4859">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4860">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4861">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4861">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4862">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4863">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4864">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4865">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4865">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4866">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4866">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4867">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4868">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4868">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4869">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4869">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4870">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4870">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4871">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4871">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4872">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4872">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4873">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4873">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4874">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4874">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4876">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4876">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4878">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4878">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4879">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4879">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4880">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4880">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4881">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4881">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4886">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4886">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4887">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4887">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4888">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4888">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4889">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4889">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4890">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4890">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4891">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4891">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4892">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4892">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4893">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4893">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4894">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4894">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4895">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4896">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4896">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4898">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4898">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4899">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4900">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4900">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4901">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4902">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4903">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4903">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4904">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4904">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4906">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4906">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4907">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4907">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4908">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4908">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4909">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4909">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4910">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4910">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4911">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4911">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4912">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4912">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4913">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4913">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4914">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4914">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4915">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4915">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4916">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4916">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4917">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4917">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4918">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4918">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4919">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4920">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4920">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4921">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4922">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4922">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4923">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4923">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4924">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4924">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4925">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4925">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4926">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4926">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4927">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4927">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4928">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4928">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4929">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4929">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4930">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4930">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4931">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4931">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4932">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4932">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4933">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4934">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4934">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4935">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4935">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4936">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4936">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4937">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4937">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4938">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4938">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4939">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4939">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4940">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4940">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4941">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4941">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4942">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4942">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4943">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4943">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4944">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4944">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4945">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4946">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4946">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4947">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4948">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4948">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4949">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4949">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4950">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4950">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4951">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4952">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4952">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4953">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4954">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4954">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4955">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4955">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4956">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4956">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4957">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4957">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4958">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4958">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4959">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4959">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4960">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4960">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4961">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4961">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4962">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4962">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4963">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4963">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4964">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4964">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4965">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4965">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4966">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4966">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4967">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4967">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4968">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4968">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4969">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4969">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4970">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4970">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4971">autovadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4971">autovadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4972">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4972">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4973">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4973">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4974">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4974">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4975">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4975">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4976">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4976">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4977">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4977">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4978">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4978">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4979">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4979">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4980">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4980">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4981">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4981">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4982">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4982">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4983">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4983">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4984">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4984">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4985">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4985">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4987">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4987">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4990">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4990">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4991">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4991">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4992">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4992">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-4993">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-4993">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5056">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5056">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5057">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5057">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5058">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5059">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5059">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5061">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5061">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5062">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5062">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5063">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5063">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5064">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5065">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5065">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5066">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5067">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5067">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5068">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5068">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5069">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5069">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5070">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5070">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5071">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5071">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5072">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5072">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5073">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5073">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5074">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5074">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5075">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5075">pase numurs</span></span>    


## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5076">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5076">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5077">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5078">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5079">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5079">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5080">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5081">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5081">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5082">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5082">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5083">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5083">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5084">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5084">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5085">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5086">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5086">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5087">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5087">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5088">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5088">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5093">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5093">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5099">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5099">driver's licence number</span></span>
