## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5103">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5103">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5105">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5105">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5107">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5107">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5108">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5108">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5109">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5109">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5110">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5110">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5111">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5111">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5112">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5113">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5113">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5114">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5115">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5115">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5116">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5116">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5117">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5117">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5119">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5119">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5154">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5154">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5155">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5155">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5156">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5157">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5157">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5159">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5159">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5160">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5161">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5161">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5162">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5163">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5164">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5164">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5165">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5165">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5166">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5167">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5167">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5168">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5168">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5169">lithunian 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5169">lithunian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5170">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5170">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5171">numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5171">paso numeris</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5172">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5172">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5173">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5173">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5175">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5175">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5177">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5177">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5179">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5179">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5181">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5182">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5182">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5183">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5183">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5184">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5184">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5189">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5189">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5190">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5190">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5194">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5194">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5195">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5195">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5196">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5196">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5197">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5197">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5198">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5198">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5199">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5199">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5200">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5201">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5201">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5203">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5203">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5204">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5204">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5205">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5205">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5206">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5207">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5207">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5208">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5209">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5210">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5210">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5211">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5211">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5212">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5213">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5213">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5236">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5236">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5237">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5237">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5238">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5239">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5239">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5240">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5241">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5241">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5242">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5243">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5243">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5244">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5245">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5245">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5246">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5246">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5247">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5247">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5248">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5248">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5249">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5249">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5253">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5253">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5254">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5254">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5255">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5256">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5256">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5258">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5258">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5259">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5259">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5260">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5260">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5261">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5261">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5262">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5262">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5263">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5263">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5264">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5264">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5265">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5265">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5266">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5266">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5267">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5268">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5270">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5270">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5271">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5271">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5272">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5272">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5273">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5274">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5274">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5312">zinn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5312">zinn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5313">zinnzahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5313">zinnzahl</span></span>


## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5314">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5314">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5315">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5316">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5316">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5317">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5318">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5318">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5319">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5319">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5320">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5320">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5321">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5321">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5322">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5322">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5323">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5323">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5324">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5324">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5325">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5326">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5326">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5327">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5328">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5328">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5329">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5329">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5330">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5330">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5346">kp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5346">kp</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5349">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5349">mykas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5353">말레이시아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5353">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5354">말레이지아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5354">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5355">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5355">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5356">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5356">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5357">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5357">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5358">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5358">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5359">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5360">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5360">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5362">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5362">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5363">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5363">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5364">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5364">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5365">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5365">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5366">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5366">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5367">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5367">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5368">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5369">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5369">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5371">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5372">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5372">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5373">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5373">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5374">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5374">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5375">Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5375">Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5376">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5376">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5378">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5378">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5379">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5379">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5380">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5380">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5381">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5381">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5382">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5382">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5383">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5383">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5384">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5384">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5385">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5385">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5386">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5386">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5387">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5387">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5388">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5388">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5389">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5389">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5390">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5391">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5391">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5392">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5393">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5393">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5394">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5394">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5395">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5395">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5397">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5397">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5399">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5400">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5401">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5402">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5402">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5403">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5403">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5404">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5405">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5405">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5406">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5406">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5407">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5407">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5408">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5408">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5409">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5409">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5410">numru ta ' personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5410">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5411">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5411">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5412">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5412">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5413">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5413">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5414">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5414">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5415">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5415">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5416">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5416">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5417">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5417">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5418">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5418">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5419">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5419">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5420">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5420">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5421">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5421">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5422">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5423">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5423">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5424">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5425">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5425">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5426">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5427">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5427">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5428">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5429">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5430">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5430">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5431">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5431">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5432">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5433">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5433">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5434">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5434">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5435">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5435">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5436">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5436">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5437">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5437">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5438">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5438">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5439">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5440">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5440">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5441">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5441">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5442">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5442">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5443">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5443">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5444">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5445">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5445">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5446">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5446">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5447">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5447">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5448">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5448">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5449">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5449">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5451">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5451">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5454">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5454">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5455">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5455">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5456">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5456">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5457">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5457">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5463">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5463">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5467">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5467">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5468">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5468">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5490">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5490">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5491">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5492">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5492">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5493">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5494">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5494">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5495">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5495">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5496">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5496">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5497">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5498">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5498">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5499">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5499">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5500">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5501">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5503">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5504">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5504">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5505">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5505">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5507">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5507">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5530">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5530">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5531">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5531">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5532">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5533">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5533">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5534">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5535">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5535">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5537">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5540">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5541">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5559">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5559">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5562">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5562">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5564">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5564">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5566">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5566">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5569">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5570">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5571">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5571">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5572">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5572">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5573">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5573">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5574">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5574">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5575">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5575">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5576">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5576">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5577">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5577">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5578">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5578">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5579">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5579">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5580">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5580">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5581">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5582">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5582">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5583">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5584">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5584">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5586">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5589">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5589">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5590">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5590">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5591">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5591">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5592">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5592">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5617">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5617">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5618">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5618">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5630">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5630">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5631">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5632">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5632">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5633">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5634">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5634">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5635">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5635">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5636">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5636">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5637">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5637">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5638">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5638">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5639">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5639">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5640">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5640">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5641">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5641">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5642">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5643">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5644">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5645">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5646">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5646">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5647">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5647">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5649">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5649">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5650">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5650">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5651">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5651">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5652">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5652">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5653">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5653">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5654">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5654">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5655">wearde tafoege 세금 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5655">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5656">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5656">btw nûmer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5657">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5657">btw-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5658">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5658">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5659">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5660">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5660">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5662">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5662">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5663">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5663">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5664">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5664">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5665">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5665">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5666">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5666">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5667">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5667">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5668">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5668">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5669">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5669">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5670">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5670">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5672">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5675">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5675">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5676">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5676">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5678">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5678">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5679">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5679">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5680">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5680">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5681">계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5681">account number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5682">은행 계좌</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5682">bank account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5683">bank_acct_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5683">bank_acct_id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5684">bank_acct_branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5684">bank_acct_branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5685">bank_acct_nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5685">bank_acct_nbr</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5686">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5686">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5687">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5687">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5688">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5688">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5689">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5689">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5690">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5690">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5691">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5691">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5692">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5692">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5693">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5694">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5697">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5697">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5698">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5698">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5699">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5700">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5700">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5767">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5767">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5768">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5769">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5769">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5770">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5771">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5771">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5772">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5772">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5773">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5773">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5774">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5774">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5775">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5775">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5776">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5776">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5777">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5778">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5778">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5779">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5780">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5780">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5781">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5781">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5782">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5782">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5783">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5783">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5784">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5784">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5791">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5791">ird number</span></span>
