## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5793">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5793">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5794">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5795">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5795">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5797">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5797">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5798">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5799">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5801">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5802">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5802">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5803">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5803">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5804">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5804">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5805">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5805">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5806">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5806">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5807">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5807">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5808">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5808">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5809">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5809">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5810">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5810">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5811">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5811">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5812">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5813">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5813">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5815">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5815">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5816">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5816">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5817">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5817">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5818">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5818">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5819">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5819">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5820">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5820">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5821">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5822">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5824">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5825">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5825">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5826">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5826">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5827">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5828">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5828">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5829">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5830">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5830">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5831">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5831">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5832">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5832">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5833">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5833">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5834">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5834">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5835">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5835">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5836">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5836">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5837">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5838">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5838">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5840">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5840">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5841">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5841">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5842">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5842">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5843">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5843">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5844">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5844">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5845">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5845">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5846">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5846">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5847">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5847">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5848">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5848">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5849">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5849">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5850">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5850">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5851">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5851">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5852">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5852">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5853">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5853">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5862">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5862">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5863">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5864">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5864">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5865">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5866">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5866">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5867">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5867">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5868">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5868">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5869">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5869">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5870">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5870">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5871">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5871">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5873">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5873">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5875">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5876">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5876">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5877">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5877">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5878">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5878">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5879">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5879">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5880">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5880">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5881">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5881">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5882">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5882">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5883">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5883">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5884">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5884">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5885">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5885">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5886">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5887">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5887">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5889">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5889">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5890">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5890">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5891">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5891">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5892">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5892">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5893">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5893">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5894">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5894">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5895">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5896">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5896">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5897">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5898">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5898">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5899">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5899">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5900">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5900">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5901">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5901">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5902">Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5902">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5903">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5903">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5904">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5904">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5916">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5916">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5917">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5917">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5918">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5918">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5919">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5920">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5920">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5921">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5922">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5922">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5923">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5924">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5924">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5925">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5925">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5926">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5926">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5927">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5927">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5928">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5928">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5929">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5929">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5930">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5930">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5931">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5931">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5932">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5932">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5933">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5933">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5935">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5935">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5936">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5936">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5937">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5937">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5938">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5938">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5939">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5940">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5940">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5941">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5941">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5942">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5942">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5943">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5943">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5944">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5944">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5945">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5946">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5946">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5947">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5948">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5948">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5949">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5949">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5950">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5950">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5951">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5952">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5952">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5953">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5953">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5954">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5954">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5966">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5966">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5967">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5967">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5968">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5969">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5969">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5971">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5971">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5972">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5973">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5973">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5974">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5975">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5975">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5976">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5976">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5977">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5977">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5978">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5978">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5979">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5979">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5980">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5980">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5984">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5984">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5985">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5985">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5986">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5987">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5987">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5988">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5989">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5989">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5990">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5990">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5991">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5991">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5992">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5992">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5993">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5993">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5994">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5995">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5995">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5997">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5997">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5998">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5998">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-5999">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-5999">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6000">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6000">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6001">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6001">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6005">통계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6005">statistical number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6010">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6010">regonno#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6018">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6018">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6019">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6019">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6020">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6020">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6021">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6021">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6022">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6022">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6023">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6024">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6024">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6026">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6027">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6027">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6028">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6028">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6058">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6058">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6060">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6060">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6062">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6062">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6063">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6064">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6064">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6065">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6066">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6066">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6067">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6067">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6068">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6068">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6088">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6088">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6089">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6089">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6090">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6091">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6091">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6093">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6093">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6094">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6094">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6095">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6096">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6096">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6097">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6097">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6098">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6098">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6099">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6100">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6100">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6102">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6102">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6103">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6103">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6104">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6104">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6120">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6120">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6121">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6121">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6122">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6123">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6123">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6124">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6125">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6125">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6126">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6126">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6127">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6127">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6128">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6129">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6129">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6132">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6132">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6133">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6133">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6134">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6134">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6135">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6135">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6137">포르투갈어 passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6137">portuguese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6138">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6138">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6139">número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6139">número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6140">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6140">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6142">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6142">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6143">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6144">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6144">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6145">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6145">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6146">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6146">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6147">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6147">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6148">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6148">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6149">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6150">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6152">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6153">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6153">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6154">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6154">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6155">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6156">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6156">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6181">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6181">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6182">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6184">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6184">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6186">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6186">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6187">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6187">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6188">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6188">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6189">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6190">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6190">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6191">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6193">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6193">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6194">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6194">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6195">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6195">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6196">Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6196">Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6197">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6197">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6210">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6210">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6211">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6212">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6212">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6213">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6214">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6214">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6215">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6215">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6216">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6216">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6217">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6217">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6219">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6219">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6221">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6222">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6222">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6223">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6223">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6225">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6225">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6276">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6276">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6277">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6277">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6279">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6279">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6280">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6281">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6281">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6282">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6283">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6283">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6286">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6286">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6287">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6287">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6288">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6289">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6289">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6290">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6290">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6291">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6291">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6292">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6292">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6293">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6293">numărul pașaportului</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6294">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6294">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6295">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6296">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6296">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6297">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6298">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6298">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6299">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6299">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6300">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6300">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6301">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6301">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6302">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6302">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6303">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6303">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6304">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6304">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6305">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6305">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6306">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6306">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6307">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6307">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6308">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6308">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6309">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6309">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6326">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6326">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6328">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6328">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6330">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6330">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6331">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6331">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6332">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6332">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6333">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6333">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6334">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6335">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6336">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6337">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6337">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6338">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6338">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6339">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6339">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6356">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6356">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6358">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6358">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6360">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6360">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6365">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6365">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6366">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6366">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6367">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6373">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6373">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6374">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6375">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6375">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6377">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6377">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6378">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6378">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6379">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6379">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6380">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6380">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6381">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6382">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6382">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6383">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6385">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6385">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6386">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6386">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6387">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6387">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6388">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6388">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6389">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6389">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6390">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6390">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6401">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6401">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6402">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6402">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6403">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6404">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6404">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6405">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6406">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6406">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6407">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6407">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6408">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6408">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6409">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6410">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6410">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6411">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6412">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6413">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6413">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6414">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6414">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6430">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6430">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6431">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6432">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6432">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6433">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6434">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6434">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6435">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6435">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6436">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6436">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6437">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6437">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6438">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6439">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6439">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6440">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6441">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6442">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6442">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6443">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6443">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6444">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6445">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6445">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
