## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6492">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6492">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6493">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6494">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6495">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6495">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6497">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6497">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6498">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6499">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6499">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6500">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6502">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6502">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6503">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6503">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6504">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6504">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6505">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6505">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6506">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6506">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6507">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6507">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6508">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6508">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6510">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6510">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6511">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6511">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6512">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6513">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6513">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6514">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6515">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6515">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6516">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6517">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6517">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6518">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6519">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6519">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6520">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6520">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6521">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6521">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6527">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6527">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6528">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6528">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6531">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6531">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6533">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6533">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6534">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6534">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6537">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6537">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6539">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6539">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6541">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6541">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6542">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6542">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6543">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6543">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6544">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6544">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6545">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6545">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6546">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6547">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6547">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6548">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6549">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6549">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6550">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6550">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6551">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6551">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6553">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6553">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6565">national id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6570">개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6570">personal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6571">개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6571">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6572">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6572">personal numeric code</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6581">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6581">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6582">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6582">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6583">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6584">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6584">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6585">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6586">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6586">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6587">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6587">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6588">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6588">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6589">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6589">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6590">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6591">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6591">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6592">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6593">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6593">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6594">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6594">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6595">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6595">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6596">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6596">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6597">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6597">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6598">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6598">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6599">슬로베니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6599">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6600">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6600">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6601">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6601">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6602">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6602">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6603">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6604">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6604">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6605">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6606">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6606">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6607">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6607">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6608">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6608">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6609">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6610">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6610">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6612">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6612">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6613">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6613">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6614">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6614">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6615">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6615">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6616">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6616">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6626">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6626">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6627">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6627">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6629">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6629">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6640">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6640">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6642">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6642">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6644">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6644">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6645">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6645">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6646">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6646">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6647">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6647">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6648">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6648">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6649">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6649">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6654">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6654">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6655">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6655">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6656">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6657">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6658">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6658">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6659">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6659">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6660">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6660">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6661">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6661">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6662">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6662">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6664">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6664">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6666">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6666">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6667">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6667">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6668">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6668">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6669">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6669">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6670">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6670">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6671">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6671">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6672">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6672">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6673">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6674">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6677">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6677">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6678">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6678">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6679">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6681">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6681">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6682">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6682">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6683">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6683">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6684">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6684">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6685">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6685">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6686">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6686">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6687">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6687">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6688">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6688">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6689">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6689">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6690">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6690">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6691">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6691">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6692">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6693">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6693">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6695">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6695">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6696">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6696">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6697">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6697">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6698">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6699">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6699">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6700">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6701">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6701">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6702">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6702">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6703">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6703">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6740">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6740">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6742">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6742">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6744">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6744">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6745">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6745">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6746">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6746">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6747">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6747">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6748">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6749">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6751">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6751">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6752">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6752">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6753">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6753">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6754">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6754">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6755">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6755">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6779">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6779">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6780">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6780">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6781">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6782">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6782">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6783">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6784">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6784">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6785">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6785">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6786">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6786">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6787">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6787">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6788">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6789">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6789">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6791">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6791">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6792">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6792">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6793">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6793">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6794">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6794">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6795">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6795">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6796">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6796">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6797">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6797">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6798">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6798">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6799">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6799">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6800">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6800">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6801">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6801">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6802">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6802">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6803">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6803">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6804">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6804">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6805">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6805">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6806">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6806">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6807">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6808">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6808">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6809">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6810">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6810">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6811">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6811">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6812">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6812">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6813">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6813">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6814">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6814">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6815">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6815">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6816">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6817">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6817">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6818">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6819">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6819">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6820">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6820">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6821">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6822">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6823">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6823">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6824">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6824">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6825">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6826">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6826">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6828">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6828">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6829">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6829">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6830">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6830">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6831">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6831">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6832">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6832">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6833">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6833">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6834">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6834">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6835">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6835">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6836">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6836">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6837">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6837">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6838">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6838">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6839">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6839">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6840">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6840">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6841">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6841">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6842">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6842">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6843">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6843">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6844">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6844">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6845">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6845">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6846">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6846">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6847">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6848">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6848">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6849">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6850">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6850">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6851">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6851">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6852">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6852">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6854">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6854">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6855">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6855">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6856">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6856">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6868">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6868">tax file number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6869">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6870">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6870">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6883">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6883">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6885">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6885">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6886">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6887">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6887">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6889">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6889">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6890">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6890">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6891">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6891">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6892">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6892">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6893">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6893">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6894">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6894">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6895">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6895">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6896">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6897">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6897">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6898">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6899">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6899">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6900">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6900">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6901">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6901">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6902">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6902">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6903">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6903">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6904">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6904">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6905">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6905">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6906">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6906">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6907">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6907">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6908">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6908">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6909">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6909">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6910">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6910">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6911">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6911">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6912">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6912">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6913">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6913">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6914">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6914">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6915">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6915">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6916">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6916">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6917">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6917">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6918">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6918">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6919">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6919">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6920">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6920">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6921">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6921">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6922">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6922">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6923">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6923">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6924">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6924">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6925">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6925">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6926">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6926">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6927">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6927">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6928">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6928">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6929">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6929">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6930">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6930">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6931">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6931">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6932">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6932">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6933">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6934">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6934">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6935">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6936">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6936">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6937">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6937">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6938">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6938">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6939">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6939">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6944">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6945">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6946">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6947">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6947">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6948">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6948">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6949">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6949">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6950">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6950">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6951">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6951">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6952">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6952">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6953">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6953">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6954">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6954">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6955">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6955">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6956">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6956">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6957">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6957">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6958">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6958">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6959">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6959">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6960">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6960">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6961">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6961">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6962">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6963">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6963">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6964">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6965">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6965">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6966">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6966">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6967">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6967">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6968">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6968">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6969">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6969">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6970">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6970">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6971">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6971">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6972">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6972">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6973">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6973">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6974">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6974">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6975">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6975">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6976">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6976">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6977">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6978">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6978">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6979">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6979">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6998">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-6999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7001">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7001">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7003">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7003">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7008">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7008">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7009">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7009">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7010">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7010">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7011">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7011">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7042">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7045">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7047">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7048">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7048">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7049">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7049">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7050">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7050">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7051">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7051">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7052">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7052">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7053">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7054">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7057">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7058">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7059">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7060">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
