- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7074">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7074">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7075">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7075">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7076">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7078">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7078">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7080">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7080">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7081">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7081">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7082">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7082">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7083">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7083">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7084">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7084">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7085">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7085">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7086">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7086">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7087">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7087">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7088">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7088">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7089">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7089">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7090">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7090">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7091">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7091">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7092">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7092">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7094">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7094">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7120">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7120">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7122">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7122">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7124">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7124">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7125">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7125">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7126">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7126">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7127">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7127">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7128">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7128">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7129">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7129">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7134">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7134">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7135">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7135">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7169">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7169">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7170">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7171">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7171">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7172">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7173">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7173">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7174">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7174">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7175">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7175">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7176">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7176">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7177">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7177">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7178">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7178">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7179">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7179">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7180">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7180">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7181">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7182">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7185">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7185">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7186">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7186">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7188">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7188">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7209">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7209">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7210">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7211">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7211">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7212">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7213">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7213">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7214">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7214">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7215">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7215">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7216">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7216">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7217">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7217">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7218">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7218">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7219">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7219">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7220">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7220">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7221">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7221">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7222">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7222">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7225">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7225">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7226">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7227">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7227">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7228">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7228">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7229">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7229">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7230">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7230">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7231">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7231">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7232">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7232">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7233">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7233">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7234">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7234">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7235">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7235">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7236">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7236">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7237">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7237">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7238">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7238">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7239">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7239">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7240">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7240">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7241">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7241">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7242">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7242">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7243">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7243">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7244">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7244">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7245">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7245">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7246">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7246">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7247">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7248">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7248">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7249">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7249">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7250">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7250">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7251">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7251">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7252">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7252">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7253">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7254">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7257">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7257">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7258">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7258">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7259">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7260">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7260">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7261">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7261">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7262">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7262">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7263">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7263">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7264">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7264">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7265">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7265">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7266">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7266">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7267">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7267">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7268">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7268">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7269">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7269">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7270">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7271">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7271">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7273">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7273">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7274">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7274">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7275">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7275">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7276">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7277">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7277">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7280">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7280">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7281">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7281">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7295">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7295">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7296">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7297">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7297">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7299">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7299">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7300">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7300">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7301">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7301">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7302">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7303">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7303">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7304">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7305">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7305">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7306">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7306">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7307">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7307">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7308">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7309">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7309">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7314">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7314">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7315">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7315">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7316">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7316">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7317">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7317">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7318">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7318">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7319">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7320">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7320">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7321">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7322">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7322">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7323">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7324">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7327">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7327">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7328">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7328">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7329">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7329">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7330">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7330">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7331">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7331">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7332">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7332">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7333">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7333">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7337">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7337">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7338">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7338">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7339">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7339">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7340">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7341">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7341">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7342">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7343">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7343">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7344">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7344">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7345">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7345">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7346">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7346">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7347">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7347">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7348">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7348">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7349">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7350">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7352">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7352">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7353">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7353">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7354">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7354">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7355">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7355">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7371">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7371">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7372">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7372">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7373">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7373">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7374">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7374">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7375">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7375">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7376">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7376">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7377">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7377">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7378">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7378">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7379">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7379">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7380">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7380">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7381">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7381">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7382">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7383">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7383">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7384">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7384">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7385">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7385">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7386">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7386">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7387">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7387">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7388">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7388">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7389">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7389">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7390">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7390">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7391">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7391">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7392">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7392">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7393">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7394">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7394">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7396">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7396">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7397">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7397">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7398">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7398">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7399">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7400">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7400">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7401">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7401">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7402">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7403">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7403">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7404">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7405">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7406">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7406">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7407">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7407">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7408">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7408">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7409">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7409">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7410">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7410">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7411">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7411">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7413">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7413">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7417">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7417">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7418">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7418">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7419">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7419">patient id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7421">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7421">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7422">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7422">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7423">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7423">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7424">G</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7424">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7425">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7425">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7426">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7426">D.O.B</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7428">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7428">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7429">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7429">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7430">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7430">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7431">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7431">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7432">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7433">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7433">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7435">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7435">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7436">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7436">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7437">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7437">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7438">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7438">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7439">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7439">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7440">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7440">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7441">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7441">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7442">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7442">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7443">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7443">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7444">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7444">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7445">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7445">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7446">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7446">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7447">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7447">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7448">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7448">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7449">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7450">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7450">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7451">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7452">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7453">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7453">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7454">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7454">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7455">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7456">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7456">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7457">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7457">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7458">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7458">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7459">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7459">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7479">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7479">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7480">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7480">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7481">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7482">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7482">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7483">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7484">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7484">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7485">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7486">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7489">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7489">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7490">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7490">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7495">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7497">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7497">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7498">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7498">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7499">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7499">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7510">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7510">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7511">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7512">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7512">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7513">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7513">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7514">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7514">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7516">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7516">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7518">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7519">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7519">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7520">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7520">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7550">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7550">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7551">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7552">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7552">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7553">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7554">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7554">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7555">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7555">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7556">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7556">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7557">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7558">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7558">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7559">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7560">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7561">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7561">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7562">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7562">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7563">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7563">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7564">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7564">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7565">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7565">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7566">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7566">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7567">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7567">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7568">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7568">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7569">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7569">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7570">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7570">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7571">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7571">DL</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7572">된다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7572">DLS</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7573">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7573">CDL</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7574">CDLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7574">CDLS</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7666">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7666">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7667">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7668">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7668">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7669">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7670">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7670">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7671">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7671">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7672">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7672">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7673">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7673">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7674">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7674">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7675">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7675">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7676">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7676">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7677">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7677">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7678">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7678">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7679">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7679">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7680">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7680">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7681">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7681">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7682">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7682">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7683">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7684">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7684">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7685">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7686">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7687">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7687">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7688">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7688">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7689">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7689">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7690">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7690">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7691">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7691">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7692">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7692">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7694">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7694">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7695">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7695">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7696">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7696">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7697">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7697">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7698">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7698">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7719">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7719">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7720">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7721">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7721">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7722">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7722">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7724">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7724">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7725">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7725">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7726">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7726">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7727">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7727">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7728">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7728">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7729">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7730">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7730">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7732">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7733">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7733">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7734">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7735">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7735">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7736">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7736">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7737">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7737">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7738">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7738">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7739">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7739">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7740">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7740">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7741">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7741">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7742">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7742">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7743">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7743">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7744">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7744">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7745">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7745">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7750">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7750">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7758">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7758">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7759">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7759">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7760">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7760">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7761">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7761">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7762">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7763">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7763">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7765">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7765">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7766">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7769">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7770">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7770">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7771">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7771">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7772">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7772">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7773">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7773">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7774">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7774">Passport Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7778">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7778">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7779">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7779">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7780">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7780">passportnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7781">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7781">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7782">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7782">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7783">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7783">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7784">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7784">パスポート＃</span></span>
