## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7792">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7792">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7793">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7794">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7794">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7795">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7796">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7796">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7797">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7798">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7801">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7801">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7802">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7802">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7803">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7803">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7804">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7804">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7805">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7805">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7806">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7806">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7807">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7807">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7808">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7808">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7809">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7809">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7810">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7810">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7811">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7811">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7812">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7813">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7813">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7815">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7815">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7816">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7816">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7817">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7817">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7818">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7819">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7819">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7820">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7821">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7821">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7822">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7822">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7823">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7823">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7824">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7824">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7825">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7825">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7826">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7826">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7827">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7827">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7828">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7828">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ffe6e-7830">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ffe6e-7830">номер паспорта</span></span>
